## Quality Checklist

- [ ] Follows [Contributing Guidelines](https://github.com/matesofmate/.github/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] Has comprehensive README with installation and usage instructions
- [ ] Includes tests with passing CI
- [ ] Published on Packagist
- [ ] Uses semantic versioning
- [ ] Has MIT or compatible license
